description: A Docker logging plugin for the Discovery Environment job execution platform.

env.name: uid
env.description: The uid of the user that should own the log files. Defaults to a uid of 0.

env.name: gid
env.description: The gid of the group that should own the log files. Defaults to a gid of 0.

mounts.name: de-log-directory
mounts.description: The host directory that logs will be written to.
